name: Bihar AMIN 2020 App: Online Mock Tests
description: About Bihar AMIN2020:  Bihar AMIN 2020 Exam is conducted online by Bihar Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board (BCECEB) to select eligible candidates for the post of AMIN in the Department of Revenue & Land Reform. Bihar AMIN 2020 is one of the most coveted jobs in the Government sector and comes with a lot of perks. This app helps you to prepare for the Bihar AMIN 2020 exam by providing the best online test series. You can practice mock tests online and achieve success.   Subjects Covered in Bihar AMIN 2020:  General Knowledge - Current Affairs, National & International Events, History, Geography, Economy, Polity and Constitution, Religion, Culture, Dances, Awards, Monuments, Books & Authors, etc.  General Science - Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Light, Heat and Energy, Chemical Reactions, Respiration, Reproduction, Chemical Bonding, Nuclear Reactions, Motion and Force, etc.   General Hindi - Sandhi, Figure of Speech, Antonyms, Synonyms, Idioms & Phrases, Unseen Passages, Reading Comprehension, Poems & Poets, Hindi Writers, Hindi Literature, etc.   General Mathematics - Averages, L.C.M & H.C.F, Work and Time, Ratio and Proportion, Pipes and Cisterns, Numbers & Ages, Mixtures & Allegations, Percentages, Mensuration, etc.  Special Features of EduGorillas Bihar AMIN 2020 Test Series:  EduGorilla offers a lot of features in its Bihar AMIN 2020 test series   Exams covered: Bihar AMIN 2020 and previous years papers   More than 10 mock tests and sectional tests are available for Bihar AMIN 2020  247 Online Access  Personalized Performance Analysis of your mock test with an All India & State Rank  Online Mock Tests as per the latest pattern; Section-wise test papers  About EduGorilla:   EduGorilla is an online educational community that encapsulates every exam held in the country. Download EduGorilla app and get: - 21,000+ mocks for 700+ competitive exams - Questions that you would probably get in Bihar AMIN Exam - A multitude of Bihar AMIN 2020 mocks, sectional tests, and previous year papers - Tests in both English and Hindi  Alerts and Notifications:  Now practice EduGorilla Bihar AMIN 2020 online test series on the go! Get regular alerts and latest updates of Bihar AMIN 2020 like exam notifications, important dates, syllabus, etc.  Practice mock tests and various online topic-wise tests on the EduGorilla Bihar AMIN 2020 App.
